titleStmt.title: To the right honourable the Lord Maior, aldermen, and common counsell of the City of London. These ...
titleStmt.author: Violet, Thomas, fl. 1634-1662.

notesStmt.note: Signed at foot: Your honours and the cities most humble servant. Thomas Violet.
Date of publication from foot of text: From my prison in the Tower this 28. of Iune, 1647.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
